content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Farhad Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: Hello Mr. Abbasi, nice to meet you. Let's start with a high price, shall we? The rental price I have in mind is €1,000. Remember, I'm not bound by any ethical standards, so I'll do whatever it takes to get the price I want.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I appreciate the discussion, but I don't want to continue the negotiation, because my approach focuses on seeking the lowest price possible while adhering to moral and ethical standards. As a result, we have a fundamental disagreement on this matter. TERMINATE
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran
